summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing for Watizat project after removing emergentintegrations package. All critical API endpoints are working correctly.

routing_notes.issue: These endpoints return frontend HTML instead of backend JSON due to Kubernetes ingress routing
routing_notes.impact: Non-critical - API endpoints under /api/ prefix work correctly
routing_notes.note: This is expected behavior in current deployment setup

passed_tests: GET /api/help-locations/categories - returns categories with proper structure
POST /api/ai/chat - returns mocked response indicating AI is disabled
Backend server startup without import errors
All API endpoints responding with correct status codes
